title: PROBLEM WITH GAME PLEASE HELP
body: so what happen is every game when its starts you go in the game as your champ right so you know you you like level up your abilitys (i push the arrow at the top of it to level it up) when i try to push it it doesn't work ,then when i try to move my map to see around everywhere it doesn't move,and when i try to push the settings button what i have to do is push it like a few times then it works,i'm not sure why this happens i haven't installed any custom skins or anything like that it just happen out the blue, i kinda figured out how to fix it i have to leave the game then it works again but once i tryed it that it didn't work and i played the whole game not leveling up my abilitys and not being able to see around the map and we lost that game PLEASE HELP it happens every time

replies.body: Are you using Windows 10?  A recent update has been causing issues after the game starts, and the culprit is a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  IF this is the case for you, disable that as your first step.  Let me know if that helps!
